name: Candy War - The Saga Begins
description:
There is my small contribution to the CandyJam.
This game was made using Raycasting Game Maker, PyxelEdit and Audacity.
All graphics and most of sounds was made by me.
Simply "kill" the candies with love to save the world !
The game is short and very easy, I apolize for that.
I hope you will have some fun.
